    PhD 1999-1990

    Year of Graduation

    • Ph. D.
      • 1999-1990

    List of student alumni on this page is sorted in reverse chronology and according to the program in which they were graduated.

    Ph. D.

    1999-1990


    1999

    </body> </table>
    1998
    StudentAdvisor(s)Thesis title
    S. Prakash Narayan (Vikram Jayaram and Kunal Basu, RRL, Bhopal) The effect of strain rate and temperature on the development of magnetic properties in nanocrystalline Nd-Fe-B alloy

    Kinkar Laha (ER) (D.H. Sastry and S.L. Mannan, IGCAR) Tensile and creep behaviour of similar and dissimilar weld joints of Cr-Mo steels
    M. Divakar (J.P. Hajra and K.T. Jacob) Thermodynamics of surfaces and adsorption in dilute iron based systems
    Dheepa Srinivasan (K. Chattopadhyay) Phase evolution, thermal stability and hardness of melt spun nanocrystalline Al-Zr based alloys
    S. Sundararajan (E.S. Dwarakadasa and R. Mahadevan, IPL) Study of the properties and particle / matrix interface in Al-12Si-10% SiCp composite

    1997
    StudentAdvisor(s)Thesis title
    N. Nagendra (Vikram Jayaram) Processing, microstructure and fracture characteristics of high volume fraction (Al2O3/Al-AlN) matrix composites
    P.K. Sagar (ER) (Y.V.R.K. Prasad & D. Banerjee) High temperature deformation processing of a 2/O titanium aluminide alloys using processing maps
    T. Seshacharyulu (Y.V.R.K. Prasad) Influence of oxygen content, crystallographic texture and preform microstructure on the processing maps for hot working of titanium and Ti-6Al-4V.
    N.B.R. Mohan Rao (QIP) (M.K. Surappa) Studies on precipitation, recrystallization and deformation behaviour of ceramic particle reinforced Al-10% Mg alloy composites

    N. Ravi Shankar (K. Chattopadhyay) Mechanisms of phase formation and magnetic properties of nano-crystalline materials
    G. Chandra Mohan (QIP) (E.S. Dwarakadasa) Extrusion processing of Al-Li alloy (1441)
    Namita Deo (K.A. Natarajan) Studies on biobeneficiation and bioremediation using Bacillus polymyxa with reference to iron ore and bauxite processing
    R.S. Sundar (D.H. Sastry) Processing and creep studies on Fe3Al based alloys
    Yu Fuxiao (FN) (E.S. Dwarakadasa and S. Ranganathan) Development of liquid phase co-spray forming and its application to Al-Si-Pb alloys
    Azharul Haq (ER) (E.S. Dwarakadasa and S. Banerjee, BARC) Near threshold fatigue crack growth and fracture toughness studies in zirconium, Zr-15% Ti and zircaloy-2
    Tania Bhatia (K. Chattopadhyay and Vikram Jayaram) Phase evolution in MgO-MgAl2O4 under non-equilibrium processing conditions
    </body> </table>
